children.description: To explore different types of movies, the user wants a list of five different genres of movies along with the most classic movie in each genre. I should call the 'genre_list_for_advanced_movie_search' function to retrieve the list of genres. By using this function, I can provide the user with a diverse selection of movie genres to choose from.

five different genres of movies:

1. Action: The most classic action movie is "Die Hard" (1988).
2. Adventure: The most classic adventure movie is "Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark" (1973).
3. Animation: The most classic animated movie is "Finding Nemo" (2003).
4. Comedy: The most classic comedy movie is "Some Like It Hot" (1959).
5. Crime: The most classic crime movie is "The Godfather" (1972).

For each genre, the most classic movie is listed. Enjoy exploring these different types of movies!

function.name: genre_list_for_advanced_movie_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "advanced_movie_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get list of all available genres"

function.name: search_by_genre_for_advanced_movie_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "advanced_movie_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Discover movies by Genre"

function.name: title_get_popular_movies_by_genre_deprecated_for_imdb
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "imdb", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get popular movies by genre
* This endpoints is deprecated, use .../title/v2/get-popular-movies-by-genre instead"

genre.description: The value of endpoint field returned in .../title/list-popular-genres endpoint

function.name: genre_for_list_movies
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "list_movies", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)"

function.name: list_movies_for_list_movies_v3
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "list_movies_v3", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.advanced_movie_search: Search for movies via advanced queries like genre, name, etc. And get all their details
2.imdb: IMDb is an online database of information related to films, television series, podcasts, home videos, video games, and streaming content online – including cast, production crew and personal biographies, plot summaries, trivia, ratings, and fan and critical reviews.
3.list_movies: An API used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results
4.list_movies_v3: This Movies API contains the data of the best movies ever made in a very easy-to-use and organized format.Great choice for REST API based Frontend Developer Projects.In the case of accessing the complete list, the Cover image, Rank, Title, Thumbnail, Rating, Id, Year, Images, Description, Trailer, Genre, Director, Writer and ID of the movies are listed.This is a lightweight web service, (REST interface), which provides an easy way to access our database.An API (Application programming...
